attributes.action: Stop the closure of the Post Office in Coleford, Somerset.
attributes.background: The Post Office in Coleford, Somerset, is due to close of 16 March 2018. The Post Office is a vital resource for the residents of this rural community (population 2313 in 2011). The Coleford Post Office is 3.1 Miles from the next nearest one (Mells) & the village only has an infrequent bus service.

rejection.details: This is an operational decision for the Post Office, not the UK Government or Parliament.
